target_text: AMMAN, Jordan (AP)  U.S. Representative Tony Hall [arrived|true] in Jordan on Saturday en route to Iraq, where he is [expected|true] to [look|false] into the [plight|true] of Iraqis after nearly 10 years of U.N. trade [sanctions|true].

input_text: lu factuality: Hall, an Ohio Democrat and one of very few U.S. congressmen to visit Iraq since the 1991 Gulf War over Kuwait, is scheduled to embark Sunday the 12-hour overland trip to the Iraqi capital, Baghdad.
target_text: Hall, an Ohio Democrat and one of very few U.S. congressmen to [visit|true] Iraq since the 1991 Gulf War over Kuwait, is [scheduled|true] to [embark|false] Sunday the 12-hour overland [trip|true] to the Iraqi capital, Baghdad.

input_text: lu factuality: He did not speak to reporters in Jordan, but he told The Associated Press before leaving the United States that he hopes to "separate the humanitarian work from the political issues."
target_text: He did not [speak|true] to reporters in Jordan, but he [told|true] The Associated Press before [leaving|true] the United States that he [hopes|true] to "[separate|unknown] the humanitarian [work|false] from the political [issues|false]."

target_text: During his four days in Iraq, Hall [said|true] he [wanted|true] to [investigate|unknown] reports from relief agencies that a quarter of Iraqi children [may|true] be [suffering|unknown] from chronic [malnutrition|false].

input_text: lu factuality: If supplies are not reaching the people who need them, Hall said, he wanted to find out whether the United Nations or relief agencies needed to handle things differently, or whether "Iraq needs to get out of the way and let us do the job."
target_text: If supplies are not [reaching|unknown] the people who need them, Hall [said|true], he [wanted|true] to [find|unknown] out whether the United Nations or relief agencies [needed|false] to [handle|unknown] things differently, or whether "Iraq [needs|false] to [get|unknown] out of the way and [let|false] us [do|false] the job."

target_text: At the entrance of the Mansour Hotel, Hall [made|true] a brief [statement|true], [saying|true] that he [came|false] to Iraq because he has [heard|false] for a long time about the humanitarian [situation|false] here, especially the [malnutrition|false] among the Iraqi children and the [increasing|false] mortality [rate|false] of the children and the elderly.

target_text: However, it has been [reported|true] that Hall is [expected|true] to [meet|false] Iraqi Health Minister Umid Medhat Mubarak and representatives of all international aid organizations [working|true] in Iraq.

target_text: Iraq has [claimed|true] that more than 1.5 million people, mostly children and the elderly, have [died|false] of curable [diseases|false] due to the decade-long U.N. [sanctions|false].
